ThingDef.label: vault walls overseers office
ThingDef.description: A wall which is usually used for the overseer office or for luxury corridors.

ThingDef.label: vault overseer office window
ThingDef.description: A window, used for the interior of a vault shelter's corridors.

ThingDef.label: Exterior Vault Plating
ThingDef.description: This wall was designed to block off potential threats from the vault by shielding away exterior threats.

ThingDef.label: Exterior Vault Embrasure
ThingDef.description: This carved embrasure allows for heavy cover targeting. It features the vault exterior plating and is just as stable, perfectly for setting up defenses at the vault entrance

ThingDef.label: Vault-tec hydroponics basin
ThingDef.description: A linkable hydroponic

ThingDef.label: Vault Interior door
ThingDef.description: Divides rooms. Simple doors must be manually opened, which slows people down.

ThingDef.label: Vault Interior door with window
ThingDef.description: Divides rooms. Simple doors must be manually opened, which slows people down.

ThingDef.label: Vault-Tec Gear Door
ThingDef.description: A State of the Art Vault-Door. It is able to resist a direct nuclear detonation! This door is not breaking so easily!

ThingDef.label: vault ground markings
ThingDef.description: A line used to tell people where to go because they don't know themselves. Use only inside. (decorative only)
